CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Address_House__c)), Address_House__c+ ' ', '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Pre_Direction__c)), Pre_Direction__c + ' ', '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Address_Street__c)), Address_Street__c+ ' ', '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Address_Suffix__c)), Address_Suffix__c+ ' ', '') + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Post_Direction__c)), Post_Direction__c + ' ', '')
CustomField.label: Full Street
